topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5456c9c06368727f818e0000#post_5456c9c06368727f818e0000
I know this might invoke drama, *BUT* Phil was a one hit wonder and he knew it.  The number of times someone claims to be cancelling a project due to people on the internet has a correlation to how unlikely the project actually exists.

To put it another way:
He never showed any actual images of Fez 2, he never showed any production, he never talked about what was going into it, he never showed any alphas, etc so in all probability Fez 2 was never in production in the first place.

More than likely he was just trying to grab for attention.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
